explains: adj. 令人紧张不安的， 令人胆怯的

sentences.en: He was a huge, intimidating figure.
sentences.cn: 他是个身材高大、令人生畏的人。

sentences.en: She admits that her height is intimidating for some men.
sentences.cn: 她承认自己的高个儿对一些男人而言是吓人的。

sentences.en: They were accused of intimidating people into voting for them.
sentences.cn: 他们被控胁迫选民投他们的票。
